item.title: Building a Slack Bot with Go and Wit.ai
item.description: Building a Slack Bot with Go and Wit.ai This is a text version of this video: packagemain #9: Building Slack Bot with Go and Wit.ai. We will build a simple Slack Bot with NLU functionality to get some useful information from Wolfram. No worries if you didn’t use Wolfram before, it’s a computational knowledge engine which can give you a short answer to your question. There are different platforms for NLU, such as LUIS.
